contentrichtext.text: '''RTC''' may refer to: * Rail [[tank car]] * [[Rail traffic controller]], a person who oversees the movement of trains and controls railway signals * [[Rail trail#Railbanking|Rails-to-Trails Conservancy]], a US organization to promote use of railroad rights-of-way as trails * [[Railway Technical Centre]], the British Rail research centre in Derby, England * [[Rational Team Concert]], an application lifecycle management tool from IBM * [[Real-time computing]] * [[Real-time communication]] is any mode of telecommunications in which all users can exchange information instantly or with negligible latency. In this context, the term "real-time" is synonymous with "live." * [[Real-time clock]], the clock that keeps the current time while a computer is turned off * [[Real-time control]] * [[Redmond Town Center]] * [[RÃ©seau de transport de la Capitale]], the regional transportation commission for Quebec City * [[Recruit training]] Command * [[Reformed Theological College]] (Australia) * [[Institutes of Technology in Ireland|Regional Technical College]], a type of college in Ireland * [[Regional Transportation Commission of Southern Nevada]], a government agency that operates the RTC Transit, formerly called Citizens Area Transit, bus system * [[Regional Transportation Commission of Washoe County]], a public body responsible for public transit and roads in Northern Nevada * [[Religious Technology Center]], the corporate body that controls the intellectual property of the Church of Scientology * [[Residential treatment center]], a live-in health care facility for adolescents with severe psychological, behavioral, and/or substance abuse issues * [[Resolution Trust Corporation]], the government-owned company created to manage insolvent financial institutions during the US savings and loan crisis * [[Responding to Conflict]] * [[Response Time Compensation]], (aka overdrive) a method to speed up LCD reaction time by changing voltage past the intended value for a short time * [[Resurrection Through Carnage]] * [[Reston Town Center]] * Right To Carry, right to [[Carrying concealed weapon|carry concealed weapon]] for self-defense * [[Right to Censor]], a World Wrestling Federation (WWF) parody of the Parents Television Council * Road [[traffic collision]] formerly called Road Traffic Accident * [[Rochester Telephone Company (disambiguation)]], one of several telephone companies in the United States * [[Rosette terminal complex]], a structure in vascular plants that produces cellulose * [[Rotterdam Terror Corps]], a Dutch gabber group * [[Atmospheric radiative transfer codes|Radiative transfer code]], a numerical model of radiation in the atmosphere {{disambig}}
